name: Umbra (Cameron Harford, LewisHewison, CodingRook, LukeB96)
description:
Built for the Epic Games Megajam  2021, Umbra is a first person horror set on a space station moments after the events of a catastrophic experiment failure. 

You wake alone only to find the station becoming engulfed by the experiment, your crew twisted and the Safety Assistant Manager torn to pieces. Find SAM's parts, put it back together in the hangar and escape the station. You aren't the only one to roam in the shadows...

--------

Controls:

WASD - Walk

Shift - Run

C - Crouch

F - Torch

TAB - Toggle Mission Display

Left Click - Interact
